languages.text: "Вы разорили планету. Уничтожили миллионы людей. Заставили склониться тех, что уцелели... вы ответите за это".
"You ravaged the planet. Wiped out millions of people. Made those who survived bend the knee... You will pay for this."
languages.original_text: "Вы разорили планету. Уничтожили миллионы людей. Заставили склониться тех, что уцелели... вы ответите за это".

traits.locale_text: "You ravaged the planet. Destroyed millions of people. Made those who survived bend the knee... And you will pay for this."
"You ravaged the planet. Destroyed millions of people. Made those who survived bend the knee... And you will pay for this."
"You ravaged the planet. Destroyed millions of people. Made those who survived bend the knee... You will pay for this."
"You ravaged the planet. Destroyed millions of people. Made those who survived bend the knee... You will pay for this."
"You ravaged the planet. Wiped out millions of people. Made those who survived bend the knee... You will pay for this."
"You ravaged the planet. Wiped out millions of people. Made those who survived bend the knee... You will pay for this."

languages.text: 「お前達は星を荒らして、何百万もの人々を蹴散らし、生き残った人々を跪かせた…この償いはしてもらう」
languages.original_text: "You ravaged the planet. Wiped out millions of people. Made those who survived bend the knee... You will pay for this."

traits.locale_text: 「お前達は星を荒らして、何百万もの人々を蹴散らし、生き残った人々を跪かせた…この償いはしてもらう」

languages.text: “你摧残了这颗行星，杀害了几百万人，强迫那些存活下来的人卑躬屈膝……你一定会为此付出代价。”
languages.original_text: "You ravaged the planet. Wiped out millions of people. Made those who survived bend the knee... You will pay for this."

traits.locale_text: “你摧残了这颗行星，杀害了几百万人，强迫那些存活下来的人卑躬屈膝……你一定会为此付出代价。”

languages.text: « Vous avez ravagé cette planète. Massacré des millions d'innocents. Forcé les survivants à se prosterner devant vous... Vous allez le payer. »
languages.original_text: "You ravaged the planet. Wiped out millions of people. Made those who survived bend the knee... You will pay for this."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez ravagé cette planète. Massacré des millions d'innocents. Forcé les survivants à se prosterner devant vous... Vous allez le payer. »

languages.text: «Habéis asolado el planeta. Masacrado a millones. Obligado a los que quedan a arrodillarse... Pagaréis por esto».
languages.original_text: "You ravaged the planet. Wiped out millions of people. Made those who survived bend the knee... You will pay for this."

traits.locale_text: «Habéis asolado el planeta. Masacrado a millones. Obligado a los que quedan a arrodillarse... Pagaréis por esto».

languages.text: "Ihr habt den Planeten verwüstet. Millionen von Leben ausgelöscht. Die Überlebende in die Knie gezwungen ... Dafür werdet Ihr bezahlen."
languages.original_text: "You ravaged the planet. Wiped out millions of people. Made those who survived bend the knee... You will pay for this."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt den Planeten verwüstet. Millionen von Leben ausgelöscht. Die Überlebende in die Knie gezwungen ... Dafür werdet Ihr bezahlen."

languages.text: "Gezegeni harabeye çevirdiniz. Milyonlarca insanı canından ettiniz. Hayatta kalanlara diz çöktürdünüz. Bunun bedelini ödeyeceksiniz."
languages.original_text: "You ravaged the planet. Wiped out millions of people. Made those who survived bend the knee... You will pay for this."

traits.locale_text: "Gezegeni harabeye çevirdiniz. Milyonlarca insanı canından ettiniz. Hayatta kalanlara diz çöktürdünüz. Bunun bedelini ödeyeceksiniz."
